hasMenuItem.name: Create Your Own Pizza (Small)
hasMenuItem.description: Customize with classic or thin crust, select from pesto, Alfredo, tomato, or garlic sauce. Over 25 toppings: vegetables, meats (including halal options), and special sauces.

hasMenuItem.name: Create Your Own Pizza (Medium)
hasMenuItem.description: Medium create-your-own pizza with options for classic thick, thin crust, or gluten-friendly. Choose from pesto, alfredo, tomato, or garlic sauce. Variety of toppings: vegetables, meats including halal, and special sauces.

hasMenuItem.name: Create Your Own Pizza (Large)
hasMenuItem.description: Large custom pizza with choice of classic thick or thin crust. Select from pesto, alfredo, tomato, or garlic sauce. Over 25 toppings including vegetables, meats (halal options available), and sauces.

review.reviewBody: Best pizza I have eaten so far in Vancouver
Amazing pizza full of flavour unlike otherplaces  around it would be better if they added sweetcorn as a stopping to the menu also
their spicy chicken and pesto pineapple are my most favorite
Ordered medium spicy mushroom pizza and it was completely different from what is shown in the picture and the taste was really awful.
Pizza tasted sad :( zero flavour :( ordered twice before and loved it but this time was really bad
